name: FireDeck: Enhancements for TweetDeck
description: A tweetdeck skin that gives some nice little extras to TweetDeck, like a wallpaper, evenly-distributed columns on higher desktop sizes and a fix for image overlays.
additional_info:
0.2 release! Added:
  • Removed the overlaying images fix until I figure out how to exclude the image from pointer events.
  • Fixed margins on the columns. There will always be a margin on the right and the left now. However, they won't flow to the center anymore.
  • Added an arc color theme to the entire thing. Half-implemented. Will be fully implemented next release.
0.1 initial release:
  • Fix for overlayed images: click anywhere outside of the image to close it.
  • Wallpaper from the game FireWatch in hi-res (2560x1440)
  • Evenly distributed columns, for down to 946px wide viewports (assuming 1080p).
  • To be fair this probably won't ever be updated on here and is only for Hiro hi Hiro
